outputs.output_descr: The project aims to catalyze the adoption of integrated ecosystem management (IEM) in the trans-boundary Prespa Lakes Basin in order to conserve globally significant biodiversity, mitigate pollution of the trans- boundary lakes, and provide a sustainable basis for the Basin's further social and economic development.   Output 1. Stakeholders strengthen legal and regulatory enabling environment and establish land and water use management basis for maintaining and restoring ecosystem health in the Prespa Lakes. Output 2. Stakeholders modify productive sector resource management practices to reduce pesticide inputs, increase habitat heterogeneity, and improve the status of target species and communities in the Prespa Basin. Output 3. Stakeholders conserve priority biological diversity across the Prespa Basin and make key protected areas in Prespa Basin fully operational.  Output 4. Stakeholders build upon ongoing cooperation by strengthening the transboundary coordination mechanisms.

The project aims to catalyze the adoption of integrated ecosystem management (IEM) in the trans-boundary Prespa Lakes Basin in order to conserve globally significant biodiversity, mitigate pollution of the trans- boundary lakes, and provide a sustainable basis for the Basin's further social and economic development.   Output 1. Stakeholders strengthen legal and regulatory enabling environment and establish land and water use management basis for maintaining and restoring ecosystem health in the Prespa Lakes. Output 2. Stakeholders modify productive sector resource management practices to reduce pesticide inputs, increase habitat heterogeneity, and improve the status of target species and communities in the Prespa Basin. Output 3. Stakeholders conserve priority biological diversity across the Prespa Basin and make key protected areas in Prespa Basin fully operational.  Output 4. Stakeholders build upon ongoing cooperation by strengthening the transboundary coordination mechanisms.

project_descr: Integrated Ecosystem Management in the Prespa Lakes Basin of Albania, FYR-Macedonia and Greece
project_title: Integrated Watershed Management of the Prespa Lake
